name: Virtual Pets
description:
V I R T U A L  P E T S

❤

on your way home you find an old device on the ground. you take a look and see it's one of those old virtual pet devices. ah, the nostalgia! you take it home with you to see if it still works. and it does! well, more or less...

❤

to play just use the arrows on your keyboard!

this is my entry for the "one room" bitsy jam ♡

❤

bitsy by adam le doux

everything else by me
